Posts.Content: rahullahiri wrote: My mother has just been diagonised for duct carcinoma.Her FNAC report is as follows----- "Smears show malignant epithelial cells aranged in clusters,acini or discretely.The cells show mild to moderate pleomorphism with nucleomegaly,nuclear hyperchromasia and scanty cytoplasm" Can somone tell me how seroius is it?I am mentally shattered.Please help!
